Name: Blender (PH)
Description: This handy blender can turn nuts into nut milk or fruits and vegetables into smoothies if milk is added.

DescriptionLocalization.es: This handy blender can turn nuts into nut milk or fruits and vegetables into smoothies if milk is added.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: This handy blender can turn nuts into nut milk or fruits and vegetables into smoothies if milk is added.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Dieser handliche Mixer kann aus Nüssen Nussmilch herstellen und aus Obst und Gemüse Smoothies, wenn Milch hinzugefügt wird.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: This handy blender can turn nuts into nut milk or fruits and vegetables into smoothies if milk is added.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: This handy blender can turn nuts into nut milk or fruits and vegetables into smoothies if milk is added.
DescriptionLocalization.it: This handy blender can turn nuts into nut milk or fruits and vegetables into smoothies if milk is added.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: This handy blender can turn nuts into nut milk or fruits and vegetables into smoothies if milk is added.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: This handy blender can turn nuts into nut milk or fruits and vegetables into smoothies if milk is added.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Этот удобный блендер может превратить орехи в ореховое молоко или фрукты и овощи в смузи, если добавить молоко.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: This handy blender can turn nuts into nut milk or fruits and vegetables into smoothies if milk is added.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 如果加入牛奶，这款方便的搅拌机可以将坚果变成坚果奶或将水果和蔬菜变成冰沙。
